ArgonTest.Name: Tuple argument
ArgonTest.InputSource:
import Ar._
proc printTuple(a: String, b: String): Unit do puts a puts b end
proc printTuple2(tupleValue: (String, String)): Unit = printTuple tupleValue
proc main(): Unit do val tupleValue: (String, String) = '1', '2' printTuple2 tupleValue end
